## CredentialIssuerLD class

A Veramo plugin that implements the [ICredentialIssuerLD](./credential-ld.icredentialissuerld.md) methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CredentialIssuerLD implements IAgentPlugin
```

<b>Implements:</b> [IAgentPlugin](./core.iagentplugin.md)

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                                | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [createVerifiableCredentialLD(args, context)](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.createverifiablecredentialld.md)     |           | Creates a Verifiable Credential. The payload, signer and format are chosen based on the <code>args</code> parameter.   |
| [createVerifiablePresentationLD(args, context)](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.createverifiablepresentationld.md) |           | Creates a Verifiable Presentation. The payload, signer and format are chosen based on the <code>args</code> parameter. |
| [verifyCredentialLD(args, context)](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.verifycredentialld.md)                         |           | Verifies a Verifiable Credential JWT or LDS Format.                                                                    |
| [verifyPresentationLD(args, context)](./credential-ld.credentialissuerld.verifypresentationld.md)                     |           | Verifies a Verifiable Presentation JWT or LDS Format.                                                                  |
